title: @ Rioter Important clarity question about Kindred's passive

replies.body: Current health damage against everyone (same way Blade of the Ruined King works).

That honestly sounds like Kindred has too many anti-health attacks. One as a permanent passive bonus for kills, one as part of her E.

I dearly hope that the passive one has a cap of some kind. Otherwise it's fundamentally broken if Kindred snowballs.
kindred is fair because they already need to be fed before it does anything worthwhile and crazy.
It's a permanent boost against everything! (Except structures, they'll make it so it doesn't work on structures)
